text: The municipality is located in Krapina-Zagorje County in northern Croatia Hraschina meteorite, first documented fall in history, contemporary illustration Hrašćina is a municipality in the Krapina-Zagorje County in Croatia. According to the 2001 census, there are 1,826 inhabitants in the area, absolute majority which are Croats. It is known for its meteorite. Category:Populated places in Krapina-Zagorje County Category:Municipalities of Croatia
title: Hrašćina
